title: Bethesda Removes Voiced Protagonist Feature From Starfield
description: Discover how Bethesda's Starfield developers made a crucial change, removing the voiced protagonist feature, leading to a more immersive and efficient game experience.

title: Call of dutyâ€™s ToxMod aims to create a safer gaming environment
description: In a significant step towards fostering a healthier gaming environment, Call of Duty has officially launched its AI-powered voice chat moderation system, “ToxMod,” to combat toxic speech within the game. The system, which has undergone beta testing in North America since August, is now available worldwide, coinciding with the release of Call of Duty: Modern ... Read more

title: Revolutionary AI-Enhanced Treatment Milestone in Cancer Care
description: In a groundbreaking development, Addenbrooke’s Hospital has emerged as the pioneer among NHS facilities by successfully employing an AI-enhanced superhot needle treatment designed to precisely target and eliminate life-threatening tumors. This cutting-edge thermal ablation procedure boasts the ability to address multiple small tumors, minimizing the risk of collateral damage to surrounding healthy tissue. A game-changer ... Read more

title: Binance recovers 94% of stolen crypto funds
description: In a shocking turn of events, Binance, the world’s largest centralized cryptocurrency exchange, recently found itself at the center of a crypto theft incident involving the abduction of executives from a client company during what was supposed to be a routine business trip in Montenegro. CEO Changpeng Zhao, commonly known as CZ in the crypto ... Read more

title: Binance Launches ILV Perpetual Futures for Illuvium (ILV)
description: Illuvium (ILV), the native token of the Illuvium ecosystem, has experienced a remarkable surge in value over the past month, prompting Binance, one of the world’s leading cryptocurrency exchanges, to list ILV perpetual futures contracts. The move allows traders to take both long and short positions on ILV, reflecting the growing interest and liquidity in ... Read more
